attributes.description: The BMW 320d G20 Generation Is Modern, Low On Fuel And Tech Savvy. Our 2019 Model Is Presented In Mineral White Metallic With A Vernasca Black Leather Interior, Blue Seams And Aluminium Tetragon Interior Trim. This 1 OWNER Vehicle Has A LOW MILEAGE Of Only 76 000 km And Retains A Full Service History With BMW As Well As The Balance Of The 5 Year Or 100 000 km BMW Motorplan And Spare Keys. Features Include A Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera, BMW LED Headlights With Extended Scopes, High Beam Assistant, M Sports Package, M Sports Suspension, M Aerodynamics Package, Parking Assistance System, Sports Seats, Harmon Kardon Surround Sound System, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Digital Cluster, 10.25 Inch Digital Infotainment System With Satellite Navigation, Bluetooth With Wireless Charging, Apple Car Play, Android Auto, USB Input, BMW Gesture Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And 18 Inch Alloy Wheels. This Fully Kitted Car Is The Perfect Luxury Sedan For Daily Use. Come And View It Today! Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
